frontmatter.titlepage:
Inventory of the Florence H. Fix Scrapbook, 1925-1926 A Collection in the

Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary 2012 &contact;

Special Collections Staff.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Scrapbook kept by Florence H. Fix (b. 1908) of Milaca, Minnesota from her junior year through graduation in the spring of 1926. Scrapbook contains invitations, programs, news clippings, letters, photographs, as well as many lengthy entries written by Florence's friends reflecting on their friendship, school days and future. A commencement memory booklet contains the full names of her classmates as well as a brief, often humorous entry listing what they would like to become in life.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Florence H. Fix Scrapbook, Special Collections Research Center, Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 07/20/2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessioned and processed in July 2009 by Ute Schechter, Warren E. Burger Archivist, with further rehousing by Kelsey Kavanaugh, SCRC staff, in September 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Florence H. Fix was born in Milaca, Minnesota and graduated from Milaca Highschool in 1926. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Florence H. Fix.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook kept by Florence H. Fix (b. 1908) of Milaca, Minnesota from her junior year through graduation in the spring of 1926. Scrapbook contains invitations, programs, news clippings, letters, photographs, as well as many lengthy entries written by Florence's friends reflecting on their friendship, school days and future. A commencement memory booklet contains the full names of her classmates as well as a brief, often humorous entry listing what they would like to become in life.
